data.name: Nebula
data.detailed_description:
We’re excited to announce that Nebula’s Kickstarter pre-launch page is now live! Subscribe now to get a chance of grabbing the limited early bird rewards when our campaign launches!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/chaossystematic/nebula-2


Build and upgrade your starship to manage, expand and evolve your crew in a single-player colony simulator game set in a vast galaxy waiting to be explored. Guide your colony through the mysteries of deep space featuring millions of stars and planets inhabited by diverse and unique ecosystems. Trade with and wage war against intricate factions ranging from desperate space pirates to galactic empires. Explore the cosmos to discover rare materials and untold riches, and lead your people to prosperity! Adapt, exploit, but make sure you are prepared to live with the consequences as your actions ripple through space-time.

Committed to our community and our roots, we are happy to announce that Nebula will enjoy extensive mod support.

Stay tuned for more exciting details! In the meantime, please visit our website to join our community:
https://www.nebulagame.net

data.short_description: A single-player starship colony simulator game with RPG elements, set in a vast galaxy waiting to be explored!
